entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
